artview.components.ManualEdit¶

class artview.components.ManualEdit(Vradar=None, Vpoints=None, Vfield=None, Vgatefilter=None, name=' ManualEdit', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Use of Points to remove data from Radar.

__init__(Vradar=None, Vpoints=None, Vfield=None, Vgatefilter=None, name=' ManualEdit', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable. A value of None will instantiate a empty variable.

Vpoints : Variable instance

Points signal variable. A value of None will instantiate a empty variable.

Vfield : Variable instance

Field signal variable. If None start new one with empty string.

Vgatefilter : Variable instance

Gatefilter signal variable. A value of None will instantiate a empty variable.

name : string

Field Radiobutton window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated with parent PyQt instance.
